name: Shadow city：Escape from the hunter hut
name_original: Shadow city：Escape from the hunter hut
description:
You were kidnapped by a strange hunter,trapped in a hut in the barren hills,How can you escape safely?
Successive traps,bring a very difficult test for your brain.
Pay attention to observation, calm reasoning, remember the tiny clues,only in this way,you can finally survive!
--------------------------------
Complex and delicate puzzles have always been our standard configuration
In the game constantly challenge the limits of your thinking
Come and see where you can go!
--------------------------------
